name: SCP BREAKROOM (Discontinued)
description:
SCP Breakroom is a project that will explain what SCPs look like, and do.

Museum mode will work like this:

A single room will include 8 SCPs. They will have a poster with some details about it. They will also be their accurate height (Compared to the player, who is 5"10.)

Sandbox mode will work like this:

An SCP selector, to spawn that SCP. There will also be an option to spawn a D-Class, and see how they interact.

Join the NSG Discord server for more information on the game! Server link: https://discord.gg/YNeEyK75qv

Upcoming updates can include, but is not limited to:

New site with 8 SCPs

Bug fixes

New sandbox mechanics (For Sandbox Mode) (NOT IMPLEMENTED YET)

New Music

New Sounds

New Secrets (;

Early Access can be joined (If in the NSG Discord Server)

Early Access Members:  

None.
